page.title: 07DAD'S DAY IN LIVERPOOL
page.content: MY DAD GETS UP AT 7:00.HE HELPS WITH THE BREAKFAST AND CALLS MY TWO SISTERS AND I.HE HAS A CUP OF TEA AND A PIECE OF TOAST,THEN GETS WASHED AND BRUSHES HIS TEETH.HE COMES DOWNSTAIRS,PUTS HIS SANDWICHES AND FLASK INTO HIS CAR AND SAYS GOODBYE TO EVERYONE BEFORE DRIVING TO WORK.DAD IS A JOINER AND WORKS MOSTLY ON REHABILITATION WORK,MODERNISING OLD HOUSES.HE USUALLY GETS HOME ABOUT 5:00.HE HAS HIS TEA AND THEN WORKS IN THE HOUSE OR GARDEN.HE GETS A BATH ABOUT 11:15 BEFORE GOING TO BED,READY TO START ALL OVER AGAIN THE NEXT DAY.THAT'S MY DAD'S DAY.
